name: Zoe Gitter
cleanBio:
Zoe Gitter has spent the past ten years working in the music industry in Los Angeles, New York and Europe.

Having been a signed DJ since she was 18, she’s performed around the world for events and brands like NYFW, Yves Saint Laurent, Art Basel, Rolling Stone, Neiman Marcus, Playboy, SXSW and many more.

In 2023, Zoe started her own party series called GAG at Sunset @ Edition with fellow DJ Alex Chapman in Los Angeles and since then, she’s had headliners and guests such as Charli XCX, George Daniel, TOVE LO, Troye Sivan, Kim Petras, Tinashe and Saweetie to name a few. Her parties have garnered huge success in only a year, causing lines and waitlists of thousands of people.

In July, Zoe opened for Charli XCX in Mexico City for her Partygirl Tour and most recently performed for Boiler Room with Charli XCX in Ibiza at Amnesia.
